rows.label: qst701203_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah... It must have been made
by someone who knew him.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm so sorry, everyone. But I had to
make sure.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0004
rows.name:
One way or another, Sharla-san will need
some closure on this.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm with you Laura. I'd have done the
same in your position.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0006
rows.name:
That's the sad thing about miracles:
they rarely happen. Don't beat yourself
up about it.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0007
rows.name:
Minochi's right. It wasn't your fault
Laura. You don't have to bear the
burden.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0008
rows.name:
Yeah... Yeah, you're right.
Thanks, guys.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0009
rows.name:
Do you think perhaps Thales-san left
something behind that we could take
to Sharla as a keepsake?

rows.label: qst701203_msg0010
rows.name:
Like what? I can't see anything of
worth left around here...

rows.label: qst701203_msg0011
rows.name:
Sharla says he was a cautious man.
In which case, it's plausible that he
would have predicted the attack.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0012
rows.name:
And we still don't know exactly why
he came back here in the first place.
I admit, I'm very curious.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0013
rows.name:
Then I suggest we start by
investigating the area around
his lodgings.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0014
rows.name: Your Majesty, please watch your step.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm sure His Majesty doesn't require
*that* much coddling, Wadatsumi.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0016
rows.name:
...Do you think he might have known
Mother?

rows.label: qst701203_msg0017
rows.name:
If he did, we owe him thanks.
It must have been a hard life for her,
all alone here.

rows.label: qst701203_msg0018
rows.name:
Yeah... If only we'd made it in time,
we could've simply asked...

rows.label: qst701203_msg0019
rows.name:
Sleep tight, Thales. I pray you're
in a better place now...
